description.en:
Young baby Amelia moves into the palace of her tyrant uncle, Tessa Illuminas, for her aunt Lucinda’s sake. As part of her new life, Amelia must now deal with conspiracies and court intrigue on top of trying to be a matchmaker of love for her aunt. Can the baby princess overcome all of this and have a happy ending?

---
- [Official English <Tappytoon> Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/the-matchmaking-baby-princess)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/hongniangxiaogongzhu/list?title_no=1674)

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/baby-princess/list?title_no=2938)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romantic-fantasy/the-matchmaker/list?title_no=3074)
description.id:
Eryl yang diasuh oleh bibinya, ternyata seorang putri raja yang hilang. Dan dia bukan bayi biasa, melainkan wanita berusia 30 tahun yang renkarnasi ke novel cerita di dunia ini. Eryl yang selalu dilindungi bibinya, akhirnya berusaha mencarikan jodoh bibinya! Namun salah satu cowok yang jadi kandidatnya, justru raja yang dikenal jahat di novel! Apakah Eryl akan berhasil menemukan pasangan yang cocok untuk bibinya?

---
- [Official English <Tappytoon> Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/the-matchmaking-baby-princess)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/hongniangxiaogongzhu/list?title_no=1674)

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/baby-princess/list?title_no=2938)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romantic-fantasy/the-matchmaker/list?title_no=3074)
description.ko:
피폐 소설 속 아가 황녀로 환생하게 된 주인공은,
자신을 키우면서 고생하는 이모를 위해 폭군 남주인 삼촌이 있는 궁으로 들어설 결심을 한다.
그런데 실제로 만난 삼촌은, 그저 애정결핍이 쪼~끔 있어보일 뿐인데..?
이모도 사랑하고 삼촌도 사랑하는, 아가 황녀님의 러블리 중매 소동

---
- [Official English <Tappytoon> Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/the-matchmaking-baby-princess)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/hongniangxiaogongzhu/list?title_no=1674)

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/baby-princess/list?title_no=2938)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romantic-fantasy/the-matchmaker/list?title_no=3074)
description.zh:
穿越率真小公主，
做起最萌牵线人！
意外遭遇车祸再次睁眼后竟发现我穿越到了小说中，还重生为潘奥吉斯宫的公主艾米莉亚·伊鲁米纳斯。为了养活一直抚养着我的小姨露辛达，我决心回到小说中的暴君小叔泰沙的身边。但实际见到的小叔却并不像传闻中那么凶神恶煞，反而像个有点缺爱的小孩子。一边是温柔的小姨，另一边是喜爱自己的小叔，可爱的艾米莉亚开始了她的红娘事业！

---
- [Official English <Tappytoon> Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/the-matchmaking-baby-princess)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/hongniangxiaogongzhu/list?title_no=1674)

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/baby-princess/list?title_no=2938)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romantic-fantasy/the-matchmaker/list?title_no=3074)
description.zh-hk:
穿越到小說中變成皇女亞米莉雅的女主角，為了辛苦的阿姨回到暴君叔叔的宮裡，卻發現叔叔並不像小說裡寫的那樣，只是有些感情潔癖…？ 一邊是溫柔的阿姨，另一邊是喜歡自己的叔​叔，可愛的亞米莉雅​開始了她的紅娘事業！

---
